entry.title: seyedalhae/Simple-Hono.js-App-for-Beginners: This repository contains a simple web application built with Hono, a lightweight web framework for the Edge runtime, Deno, Bun, and Node.js. The app demonstrates basic routing, query parameters, and JSON responses.
entry.content: This repository contains a simple web application built with Hono, a lightweight web framework for the Edge runtime, Deno, Bun, and Node.js. The app demonstrates basic routing, query parameters, and JSON responses.

entry.title: Burhanverse/rssify: A lightweight telegram bot powered by NodeJS™, that helps you stay updated by delivering content from your favorite RSS feeds directly to your group chat or in private. Customize, organize, and manage your RSS subscriptions effortlessly!
entry.content: A lightweight telegram bot powered by NodeJS™, that helps you stay updated by delivering content from your favorite RSS feeds directly to your group chat or in private. Customize, organize, and manage your RSS subscriptions effortlessly!

entry.title: homayunmmdy/MiniBlock: MiniBlock 2D is a lightweight, 2D game. The goal of this project is to improve JavaScript skills while offering a fun, interactive experience for players. Whether you’re a gamer exploring blocky worlds or a developer honing your skills, MiniBlock 2D has something for you!
entry.content: MiniBlock 2D is a lightweight, 2D game. The goal of this project is to improve JavaScript skills while offering a fun, interactive experience for players. Whether you’re a gamer exploring blocky worlds or a developer honing your skills, MiniBlock 2D has something for you!

entry.title: Legcord/Legcord: Legcord is a custom client designed to enhance your Discord experience while keeping everything lightweight.

entry.title: marcuwynu23/frbjs: a lightweight RabbitMQ wrapper built with `amqplib`, designed for seamless message sending and receiving with minimal setup. Perfect for quick integrations and scalable solutions.

entry.title: jens-maus/RaspberryMatic: :house: A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware.
entry.content: 🏠 A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware.
